name: Don't Touch The Woodpeckers
description:
Let your little birds fly. Don't touch the woodpeckers, especially their spikes.
How high can you fly?

Call all Robin Hood's birds for help. Collect coins, avoid spikes and develop your skills.

The game offers several fascinating modes:

[Classic] - Fly high. Will you be able to fly above the trees up to space?
[Fly&Fall] - Fly high and fall down – collect points.
